name: Lucky Horseshoe
description:
For centuries Horseshoes have been considered one of the best lucky charms you could own. 
This specific lucky charm evolved over time from the humble Horseshoe that was hung over doorways to wearable pendants and finally into a special physical coin that you carry in your wallet to bring you luck.
We are now taking the evolution further by introducing a digital version of the Lucky Horseshoe in the form of a crypto asset.
AFTER ALL, YOU CAN NEVER HAVE TOO MUCH LUCK ON YOUR SIDE, RIGHT?
